title: [BUG] Font Typefaces do not work in Blazor

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

Labels will be applied to indicate reliability concerns and the affected platform (WebAssembly), as well as specifying that the area of impact is the SkiaSharp views in a Blazor application.

This issue does not appear to be a regression, but it involves unexpected behavior in rendering fonts within the Blazor application.

Additional remarks:
* The labels selected accurately highlight the issues with font rendering in the Blazor application using SkiaSharp; however, there are no mismatches identified with the content of the issue.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- The issue indicates a problem with font typefaces not changing within a Blazor application using SkiaSharp.
- It is categorized under the reliability aspect as it reflects unexpected behavior in rendering.
- The issue specifically affects WebAssembly, as that is the platform being used for the Blazor application.
- The area of focus is on SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor, particularly regarding font rendering in the SKGLView component.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action         | Item                            | Description                                                                                                             |
| :------------- | :------------------------------ | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Apply Label    | tenet/reliability              | The issue involves the inability to change font typefaces, indicating reliability concerns in the rendering process.   |
| Apply Label    | os/WASM                        | The issue is related to a Blazor application running on WebAssembly (WASM), highlighting the platform's involvement.   |
| Apply Label    | area/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor    | The issue pertains to the use of SkiaSharp in the Blazor application, specifically with font display in the SKGLView. |

</details>
